metadata.title: CVE-2015-5251 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
OpenStack Image Service (Glance) before 2014.2.4 (juno) and 2015.1.x before2015.1.2 (kilo) allow remote authenticated users to change the status oftheir images and bypass access restrictions via the HTTPx-image-meta-status header to images/*.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glance - 2:11.0.0-0ubuntu1
glance-api - 2:11.0.0-0ubuntu1
glance-common - 2:11.0.0-0ubuntu1
glance-registry - 2:11.0.0-0ubuntu1
python-glance - 2:11.0.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glance package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:11.0.0-0ubuntu1').
